mainEntity.name: What is WPC/UPVC and why is it better for furniture?

acceptedAnswer.text: WPC (Wood Plastic Composite) and UPVC (Unplasticized Polyvinyl Chloride) are advanced materials that offer superior benefits over traditional wood. They are 100% waterproof, termite-resistant, eco-friendly, and require minimal maintenance while providing the aesthetic appeal of natural wood.

mainEntity.name: How long does a modular kitchen installation take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Typically, a modular kitchen installation takes 10-15 days from measurement to completion. This includes design finalization, manufacturing, and professional installation by our expert team.

mainEntity.name: Do you provide warranty on WPC/UPVC products?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! We provide up to 10 years warranty on our WPC/UPVC kitchen cabinets, 7 years on wall panels, and 5 years on ceiling solutions. Our warranty covers manufacturing defects and structural integrity.

mainEntity.name: What areas do you serve for installation?

acceptedAnswer.text: We primarily serve Jaipur and surrounding areas in Rajasthan. For projects outside our standard service area, please contact us to discuss logistics and feasibility.

mainEntity.name: Are WPC/UPVC materials safe for kitchen use?

acceptedAnswer.text: WPC/UPVC materials are completely food-safe and non-toxic. They're also heat-resistant, moisture-proof, and easy to clean, making them ideal for kitchen environments.
